Skate Spot

Research

There are many people who love to skate, they could be hockey players, figure skaters, familys and friends.

Having an app to help them locate various indoor or outdoor rinks would simplify their activities. The app would offer then information about each rink such as hours and how busy they are. The included features are a map, list of rinks and list of favourites.

Sketches

Usability Testing

After creating the app flow, a paper protoype was created in order to have usability testing.

Once the paper prototypes were tested, it was time to create low fidelity prototypes.

Map Page

Rinks Page

Favourites Page

Rink Info Page

Solution

The goal of this app was to keep it simple for all users to easily access the app. Young children might want to find a location to go skating with friends or family.

Having minimal features keeps the app clean and useful. This app is made for skaters so everything relates to skating. All helpful and necessary features were added.
